scripts.install-all: concurrently --kill-others "npm run install-wrapper-library & npm run install-wrapper & npm run install-wrapper-extensions & npm run install-wrapper-application & npm run install-ws-server"
scripts.relink-library-to-all: concurrently --kill-others "npm run linklib-wrapper & npm run linklib-wrapper-extensions & npm run linklib-wrapper-application & npm run linklib-ws-server"
scripts.build-all-modules: concurrently --kill-others "npm run build --prefix ./kitsune-wrapper && npm run build --prefix ./kitsune-wrapper-extensions && npm run build --prefix ./kitsune-application-test-dummy && npm run build --prefix ./kitsune-ws-server"
scripts.launch-all: concurrently --kill-others "npm run launch-application & npm run launch-server"
scripts.build-from-scratch: npm i && npm run install-all && npm run build-library && npm run relink-library-to-all && npm run build-all-modules && npm run launch-all
